pullrequest.title: Update list of R packages required for installation.

content.raw:
Ideally it should all be done from a single `pip` command. `easy_install` is deprecated and so is the old `install.py` script. They should not be used.

You can add hooks into the the setup process when pip is used to potentially install extra software. I'm not sure of the details but there should be documentation for it.
